title: Schneider Electric Demonstrates Industry-Leading Energy Management Solutions at NECA 2023 - PR Newswire
summary: Schneider Electric announced a range of new product innovations at the NECA 2023 Convention & Trade Show, including Schneider Home, an integrated home energy management solution. The products aim to support electrical contractors and installers in the new energy landscape by enhancing energy efficiency, safety, and sustainability.
product_or_process: Schneider Home, VisiPact Safety Switch, SourcePacT Isolation Switch, EcoStruxure Microgrid Flex, QO Smart Panel Solution, and EcoConsult Electrical Digital Twin Service
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 335110 - Electric Lamp Bulb and Part Manufacturing, 335210 - Small Electrical Appliance Manufacturing, 335313 - Switchgear and Switchboard Apparatus Manufacturing, 335999 - All Other Miscellaneous Electrical Equipment and Component Manufacturing

title: Schneider Electric Unveils Latest Texas Manufacturing Plant as Part of a $300 Million Investment in U.S. Manufacturing - PR Newswire
summary: Schneider Electric unveils new manufacturing plant in El Paso, contributing to America's infrastructure build out and energy transition with a $300 million investment creating 400 new jobs. The facility will produce electrical equipment supporting data center markets.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 335313 - Switchgear and Switchboard Apparatus Manufacturing, 335314 - Relay and Industrial Control Manufacturing, 335999 - All Other Miscellaneous Electrical Equipment and Component Manufacturing, 334419 - Other Electronic Component Manufacturing

title: Schneider Electric Opens Pre-Orders for Schneider Home, A First-of-its-Kind Home Energy Management Solution - PR Newswire
summary: Schneider Electric announced the Schneider Home, an integrated home energy management solution, EcoStruxure Microgrid Flex, EcoXpert Microgrid Badge certification, and bidirectional EV charging to support the new energy landscape for prosumers.
green_innovation: TRUE, The innovations such as Schneider Home energy management solution and bidirectional EV charging align with environmental sustainability goals by promoting energy efficiency, decarbonization, and renewable energy sources.
business_innovation: TRUE, Schneider Electric's introduction of new products and solutions such as Schneider Home and bidirectional EV charging represents business innovation as it significantly differs from their previous offerings and is introduced in the market.
green_product: TRUE, Schneider Home, the integrated home energy management solution, qualifies as a green product due to its design and functionalities that aim to reduce environmental impact throughout its life cycle by promoting energy efficiency, renewable energy use, and sustainability.
green_process: TRUE, The article mentions EcoStruxure Microgrid Flex and EcoXpert Microgrid Badge certification, which are green processes as they focus on minimizing environmental impacts and promoting sustainability in energy management through innovative technologies and standardized development approaches.
product_or_process: Schneider Home, EcoStruxure Microgrid Flex, EcoXpert Microgrid Badge certification, bidirectional EV charging
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 221122 - Electric Power Distribution, 238210 - Electrical Contractors and Other Wiring Installation Contractors, 335313 - Switchgear and Switchboard Apparatus Manufacturing, 335999 - All Other Miscellaneous Electrical Equipment and Component Manufacturing
greenwashing: FALSE, The article does not display characteristics of greenwashing as it emphasizes real and concrete efforts towards environmental sustainability goals and does not contain false or misleading information regarding the environmental benefits of the innovations.

title: Anker SOLIX Showcases Next-Generation Home Energy Solutions at RE+ 2023 - PR Newswire
summary: Anker debuts at RE+ 2023 with new home energy solutions including the SOLIX X1 and F3800 Portable Power Station, aiming to redefine energy independence. The article highlights survey insights on consumer preferences for solar and battery backup systems in the U.S.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 335999 - All Other Miscellaneous Electrical Equipment and Component Manufacturing, 221118 - Other Electric Power Generation, 335313 - Switchgear and Switchboard Apparatus Manufacturing, 335312 - Motor and Generator Manufacturing
